para.text: Version 5.2
Added support for FMP4 package MODFLOW-OWHM version 2.
Added support for CFP2 package MODFLOW-OWHM version 2.
Added support for Buoyancy package for MODFLOW 6.
Added support for Viscosity package for MODFLOW 6.
Added support for Transient Hydraulic Conductivity package for MODFLOW 6.
Added support for Transient Storage package for MODFLOW 6.
Added support for SUTRA version 4.
ModelMuse can now import FHB boundaries from Shapefiles.
The Show and Hide Objects dialog box now has "Calibration Data Sets" as a new category.
ModelMuse can now export FHB data to shapefiles in the "File|Export|Shapefile|Objects to Shapefile" dialog box.
The RunModel.bat file used by PEST now has code to show the elapsed time for generating the input files, running the model, and extracting the model results.
In the PEST Observations results graph, clicking on an observation point will cause that point to be labeled on the graph and in the ModelMuse main window.
The Export Objects to Shapefile dialog box now has an button to toggle all the times to export.
The Export Objects to Shapefile dialog box now allows data to be exported to a CSV file instead of to an XBase file.

When converting the SFR package in MODFLOW-2005 to the SFR package in MODFLOW 6, the formula for the top of the stream bed now ensures that the top of the stream bed minus the bed thickness is always higher than the bottom of the cell.
When converting the SFR package in MODFLOW-2005 to the SFR package in MODFLOW 6, the upstream fraction for any diversion segments is set to zero.
ModelMuse can now import Vertex values based on vertex locations in the Object Properties dialog box.
When exporting contours to Shapefiles, ModelMuse can now export contours for multiple layers.
Added support for exporting the outline of the current layer to a Shapefile.
Added dynamic time series for MODFLOW 6.
When importing Shapefiles, ModelMuse now checks to see if the grid or mesh overlaps with the shapes in the shapeFile.
Improved conversion of SFR package from MODFLOW-2005 to MODFLOW 6.
It is now possible to import multiple Surfer grid files simultaneously.
Improved conversion of SFR package when switching to MODFLOW 6 from earlier versions of MODFLOW.
Added support for SFR cross sections in MODFLOW 6.
The "Edit Feature Formula" dialog box has been modified to allow the user to specify a different formula for each edited object.
The Import Points dialog box has been changed to allow more more flexibility in import model features.
The Mesh|Specify Mesh dialog box has been modified to allow the user to specify a 3D mesh.
The Import Points dialog box has been changed to allow allow importing GWT concentrations and UZF boundaries for MODFLOW 6.
ModelMuse can now import data from binary output files created by the MAW, MWT, SFR, SFT, UZF, and UZT packages in HODFLOW 6.

In MODFLOW 6 models, the BICGSTAB solver option will be used automatically for models that use the XT3D option in the NPF package or DISV models in which the GNC package is used and the EXPLICIT option is not used in the GNC package.
Added support for exporting CSV budget files in MODFLOW 6 models.
Added support for the wel-reduction observation type in the MODFLOW 6 Observation Utility.
When the MVR package receiver is a group of UZF cells. there is now an option to distribute the MVR flow equally to the UZF receiver cells.
Added support for BUDGETCSV, FLOWCORRECTION, and MAW_FLOW_REDUCE_CSV options in MAW.
Added an error message for calibration observations with observation times equal to the start of the simulation.
A "Sum" function has been added to the functions supported in the Formula Editor.
Added a check that the MAW radius is the cell effective radius.
When editing layer group names, potentially duplicate layer group names are handled without displaying a warning message.
When any dialog box is minimized, the main form of ModelMuse is minimized too.

ModelMuse does not draw a image of an SFR 8-point cross section in the Object Properties dialog box unless the 8-point cross section is in use.Bug fix: Fixed export of PEST input files on computers in which a character other than the period is used as a decimal separator.
Fixed bugs in Observation extractor programs that could sometimes prevent them from being able to read the output files correctly.
Fixed bug that prevent PEST from working correctly with GWT in MODFLOW 6.
Fixed bug that would cause ModelMuse to fail in creating the SFR input files for MODFLOW 6 models with diversions in the SFR packages.
Fixed bug that would cause the batch file for running a model to be created incorrectly in some cases.
Added a test for ensuring that MODFLOW 6 did not use the Save Saturation option when used with MT3D-USGS.
Fixed bug that would cause the ETS package to be imported incorrectly if the evaporation segments were reused.
Fixed importing UZF data from a Shapefile.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation when activating MODFLOW-LGR.
Partially fixed bug in creating PLPROC scripts for modifying data sets with large number of layers.
Completed fixing bug in creating PLPROC scripts for modifying data sets with large number of layers.
Fixed a bug that could cause a stack overflow when displaying data.
ModelMuse does not include parameters in the model if they are not needed.
Fixed bug that would prevent elevations from being updated if the front and side views were hidden.
Fixed bug that could cause head observations in the Head Observation package to be skipped if their times were at the beginning or end of the simulation.
Fixed a bug in exporting contours to Shapefiles that would cause an assertion failure.
Fixed importing of MODFLOW-NWT models in which the UZF variable NUZTOP is set to 4.
Fixed exporting grid data for boundary conditions to Shapefiles.

When pasting objects from the clipboard into ModelMuse, the unique identifier of HOB observations and SUTRA state calibration observations are now reassigned to prevent potential conflicts with existing calibration observations.
Fixed bug exporting SRF in MODFLOW LGR models if unsaturated flow was enabled in SFR.
If some observations have duplicate GUIDs, ModelMuse reassigns the GUID.
Fixed bug that could cause an exception when drawing the horizontal ruler in SUTRA profile models.
Fixed bug in assigning UZF as a MVR source in MODFLOW 6.
Fixed bug in which the SUTRA data sets for regions were not properly renamed when opening old ModelMuse files containing data sets for regions.
Fixed pasting of GWT concentrations in the Object Properties dialog box.
Fixed pasting data into the Observation Comparisons dialog box.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation when opening the MODFLOW Packages and Programs dialog box.
Fixed loss of data when editing multiple MNW2 wells simultaneously.
Fixed bugs in assigning data for MODFLOW 6 IST package.
ModelMuse no longer generates an error message for the MVR package if the MVR input in an object does not include all stress periods.
Fixed bug that caused an access violation when editing evapotranspiration bounddaries in MODFLOW 6 models in which the groundwater transport process was active.
Fixed bug in defining SUTRA step TIME CYCLE time schedules whent the initial time for the time schedule is not zero.
Fixed exporting SUTRA input files when BCTIME has been modified.
Fixed editing of ETS information in the Object Properties dialog box.
Fixed editing of MAX information in the Object Properties dialog box.
Fixed export of UPSTREAM_FRACTION in MODFLOW 6 SFR packages for diversion reaches.
Fixed importing MODFLOW-2005 and MODFLOW-NWT models in which the number of segments in the ETS package was set to 1.
Fixed a bug in Mf2005ObsExtractor that caused simulated from the HOB package to be incorrectly read as zero.
Switching from a MODFLOW-NWT to a MODFLOW-OWHM model no longer results in the NWT and UPW packages being deactivated.
Fixed a bug that could cause an assertion failure when exporting the MVR package input file.
Fixed export of shapefiles of contours for MODFLOW DISV models in which the active area varies among layers.
Fixed bug in importing Shapefiles that contain null shapes.
Fixed a bug that could cause an error when assigning data with objects that have a large number of cells.
Fixed a bug that would cause an error when attempting to read an empty .Values file from PEST.
Fixed drawing contours on the side view for DISV meshes.
Fixed export of flow observations in the CHD, DRN, GHB, and RIV, packages in MODFLOW 6 models.
Fixed export of to-mvr observation types for the for WEL, DRN, RIV, and GHB packages.
Fixed bug in editing the format of text in the rulers that could cause a bug report to be issued if the text for the sample number was not a number.
Fixed error message issued when all downstream MODFLOW 6 SFR segments are inactive.
